data.name: ChildBlogsDesc.Text
data.value: If you would like to break your blog up into different categories, this is where you define them. Having Child-Blogs allows you to create sub-blogs within your blog. Each one has its own options for publication and can be syndicated separately from your root blog.

data.name: msgDeleteChildBlog.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this child blog ?

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
Blog - Edit Blog

These options control the main blog features.

Title
This is the display title for your blog. It will display at the top of your entry list and in the blog directory.

Description
This is a brief summary description of your blog. It's a good place to describe your intentions with your blog and what information readers can expect.

Make this blog public
If checked, all the visitors who have view permissions to the page will be able to read the blog. If unchecked, the blog will be visible only to the blog owner.

When displaying your identity use
This setting controls the name that will be displayed as the author of the content. Two options are available: the DNN user name or the user's full name.

MetaWeblog Options
The displayed URL is to be used to connect to your blog using a MetaWeblog enabled client such as Windows Live Writer or Word 2007. The tabid parameter may be changed as needed if this blog appears on a different tab.

Comment Options
These options control the comment related settings. Comments may be added by registered users, Unauthenticated users or from other blogs as Trackback comments. The blog owner has three options: Allow, Disallow or Require Approval. If Allow is checked, the comments will be displayed as soon as they are added. If Disallow is checked, comments will be disabled. If Require Approval is checked, the comments will need to be approved by the blog owner before being displayed.

Send mail notification after comments and trackbacks are posted
If checked, the blog owner will receive an email whenever a comment is added to a blog post.

Use CAPTCHA for comments
If checked, this will enable a security check when adding comments to avoid spamming.

Trackback Auto Discovery (Client Mode)
If checked, the module will scan the entry post when it is added in search of trackback links and attempt to send them a trackback comment.

Syndication Options
Here the blog owner can decide if make an RSS feed available to the visitors for the blog. If checked, an RSS icon with the corresponding link will be displayed besides the blog title in the blog list. The blog owner may also decide to include an email in the "ManagingEditor" field of the RSS feed.

Date and Time Options
These options control how date and time are displayed within your blog. This setting effects all categories and entries within your blog.

Regenerate Blog PermaLinks
This link can be used after the Friendly URLs setting has been changed for the site. When clicked, the module will scann all the entries and attempt to regenerate all the permalinks according to any cahnges to the Friendly URLs settings and to the entry titles.

Child Blogs
If you would like to break your blog up into different categories, this is where you define them. Having Child-Blogs allows you to create sub-blogs within your blog. Each one has its own options for publication and can be syndicated separately from your root blog.

data.name: lblTitle.Help
data.value: This is the display title for your blog. It will display at the top of your entry list and in the blog directory.

data.name: lblSyndicationEmail.Help
data.value: Use this email for the "Managing Editor" rss field.

data.name: lblDateTime.Help
data.value: These options control how date and time are displayed within your blog. This setting effects all categories and entries within your blog.

data.name: lblDescription.Help
data.value: This is a brief summary description of your blog. It's a good place to describe your intentions with your blog and what information readers can expect.

data.name: msgDeleteBlog.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this blog ?

data.name: chkAutoTrackbacks.Help
data.value: If you enable this option an auto discovery for trackbacks will be done while saving your blog entry

data.name: lblTrackbackOptions.Help
data.value: These options control the Trackback related settings.

data.name: lblRegenerate.Help
data.value: Regenerate all blog permalinks. This link can be used after the Friendly URLs setting has been changed for the site.

data.name: lblChildBlogsOff.Text
data.value: Child blogs have been switched off by the administrator. Please use categories instead. You can still edit existing child blogs but you won't be able to add new ones.

data.name: lblMetaWeblogNotAvailable.Text
data.value: MetaWeblog clients integration has been disabled

data.name: lblAllowAnonymousComments.Help
data.value: These are users who are either not logged into the website or they are not members of the community (in other words, anonymous).

data.name: lblCaptcha.Help
data.value: If checked, site visitors will have to enter a CAPTCHA when posting a comment.

data.name: lblMetaWebBlog.Help
data.value: Use the following URL to connect to your blog using a MetaWeblog enabled client such as Windows Live Writer or Word 2007. Change the tabid parameter as needed if this blog appears on a different tab.

data.name: lblPublic.Help
data.value: If checked, site visitors will be able to view your blog entries (if they can view the blog page/module).

data.name: lblSyndicate.Help
data.value: If checked, the blog will be available to other site visitors via RSS.

data.name: lblSyndicateIndependant.Help
data.value: If not checked it will be syndicated as a category of the parent blog.

data.name: lblUserIdentity.Help
data.value: The format your name will be displayed when users are viewing your blog entries (on the site or via syndication).

data.name: lblUsersComments.Help
data.value: These are users who are known to this website and logged in when commenting (members of the community).

data.name: lblAuthorMode.Help
data.value: Personal (default) - Grants only the blog owner permission to post to this blog, Ghost Writer - Enables the owner and ghost writers the ability to post but all posts will appear to be authored by the blog owner, 3 - All Bloggers - All bloggers (not ghost writers) are permitted to post to this blog and will be credited as the entry authors.

data.name: lblAllowComments.Help
data.value: If checked, registered users will be permitted to post comments (how this is done is controlled at the module level).

data.name: lblImage.Help
data.value: You can specify an image to be associated with this blog.

data.name: lblIncludeImagesInFeed.Help
data.value: When selected then the RSS feed from the module will include links to the images you include for the blog and the blog posts. The requests for these images are not authenticated. I.e. anyone could potentially see those images if they knew the link.

data.name: lblMustApproveGhostPosts.Help
data.value: If selected all posts written by someone else than the blog's owner must be approved by someone who has approval permissions or the owner.

data.name: lblPermissions.Help
data.value: Specify the permissions others have for this blog

data.name: lblPublishAsOwner.Help
data.value: Is selected all posts written by ghost writers will be published as if they were written by the blog's owner

data.name: lblLocale.Help
data.value: Select the language this blog will be written in
